name: Signal 27
description:
The game

-Avoid obstacles by moving left and right! (Using A & D from WASD)

-Don't get hit or you will die.

-Destroy tree stumps in your way with your flamethrower! (By pressing and holding space)

-Get to the top of the hill and light the bonfire!

Credits

Programmers: 

  • Viktor Andersson
  • Lassi Jylhänkangas
  • Alex Hofman

Artists: 

  • Sebastian Claesson https://www.artstation.com/sebbenyao
  • Julian Hoogendoorn
  • Thobias Meerhof

Game made during the International Educational Game Jam 2022
